name: Day / Night
description:
Controls:
  • Up/Down - Switch lanes in orbit
  • Spacebar - Reverse direction
Objective:

Collect the other orbs in the daytime and avoid them at night.

Tools:
  • Unity
  • Simple Spectrum
  • https://flatuicolors.com/
Attributions: 
  • Music: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/UltraCat/
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/dimitri.font
  • Sound Effects: https://opengameart.org/users/phoenix1291
